query:
ALTER TABLE performanceEvaluations 
ADD COLUMN selfScore INT NULL COMMENT 'Nota da autoavaliação (0-100)' AFTER consensusCompletedAt,
ADD COLUMN managerScore INT NULL COMMENT 'Nota do gestor (0-100)' AFTER selfScore
